title: Leave Champion Select Button
body: I want there to be a dodge button in champion select, so that I don't have to leave my client in order to leave a troll game. I also want there to be a system where people can dodge a game without getting punished for leaving.  I really hate having to queue with troll players. Often times when this occurs is when people don't actually get their desired role, they just threaten to lose a game for the entire team by playing troll champions. I believe having this kind of system would help players a lot in ranked games. As they won't feel frustrated when being paired with a troll and having to lose lp for leaving or for playing with them and losing.

replies.body: I support this idea, but you have it in the wrong board, this should go in the concept board since it's a new idea, one I'm sure the community will support.

As long as it working something like the aram reroll I would be fine with it. Letting you dodge 2 out of say 25ish games wouldn't effect que times too badly and if you feel the need to dodge more than that then you are probably toxic.
